Producer: Mate Cantero, Yves Marmion, Stéphane Sorlat, Daniel Toscan du Plantier, Martin Wiebel
Screenwriter: Didier Decoin, Cuca Canals, Jean-Louis Benoît, Bigas Luna
Synopsis: A married French foundry worker (Olivier Martinez) eroticizes his encounter with a woman (Aitana Sánchez-Gijón) who apparently died on the ship.
Title: The Chambermaid on the Titanic
